lmy: Diha WUWE lara badatadayi tutna kapore Korona bana pala ta diha ata-diha ata
we tarumna ata kalawara bana tamawe
Hamarau wikna. Kailam yanau we tarumna bamudedewu, duda dapa wali ta ata kalawara
Nyi bamuetayi ata kalawara katagge, kaihora
YID MASKER. Tanam badatagge waleka badaihoraka kana engage lar tamasker illa napala we ta ata heka.
Noto hege nade ata walena kalawara’ma. Tanyiduwe karawa dahenage tauna.
Ata behayanna bena kapore dadi ai kamang tadkana, tanyiduwe engadauge banapala kapore wal ta barana ta diha ata.
Kahada baningu kada hadikorauge tauda wal ta ata buta, oroge aida tadayi baiyai ka kalawara.
Tanyiduwe, we tarumna ata kalawara na da’we bana kadaktawe ta…
waleka mata ata olem ta uma,
Nyi ai wuk kamuge bamunarodi rattu tangadi kadana, lodoge bamnaroge matam,
Wuwe lara kahadda yannana kadahilpa walta kapore Korona balidaka bahayi limmada waina habo, waleka alkohol.
Kapore Korona natahna kahha diki dokabul pata jam ta pan tangngadi hadau.
Oro bataudage dau dahage dokge rade pata pahilpa dangngada.
Ilam jojawe matam (mono mata ata wadeka).
Aga linna dawe hada baha limma kana murahai?
Bajojawe, ilam madautaka. Geha bahayi limma waina habo.
Kapore naha ana lar tamasker bana mojage bada waige.
Baitage maskerumu bana matkage. Ila waikana masker reh walta wu lado.
Ilam dudana haya, ilam hawukanahatauwai haya, koba we ha enu, mono kaba hahopwai.
Wale nadadimawe bammu jojawe matamu waina hima’la daumu, kaba’moge.
Bana da’kawe, bugerage mono tonwe bina waina hima’la waleka bale.
Be bamhagawu aimu tamahou ta umma
Bacayi hatak wadeka hatulha radde dete!
"This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel" by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, in Business Insider (Jan 21, 2020)
"The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe", by Laurie Garrett, in Foreign Policy, Report. (Jan25, 2020)
"How to avoid the coronavirus? Wash your hands", Elizabeth Rosenthal, in New York Times, Opinion. (Jan 28, 2020)

Keterangan tambahan: Tindakan pencegahan dalam bentuk komik ini sangat efektif untuk mencegah penularan penyakit umum lainnya, seperti flu dan pilek, dan harus diterapkan dalam kehidupan sehari-hari, bahkan ketika tidak ada wabah. lmy: Tutge kapore Korona    Diha WUWE lara badatadayi tutna kapore Korona bana pala ta diha ata-diha ata   ta baana ta karruna ta matana we tarumna ata kalawara bana tamawe  Ata ai kalawara Ata kalawara  Kapore Korona napala wali ta,  Hamarau wikna. Kailam yanau we tarumna bamudedewu, duda dapa wali ta ata kalawara 1 0,5m-2m Ihoo!! Nyi bamuetayi ata kalawara katagge, kaihora  YID MASKER. Tanam badatagge waleka badaihoraka kana engage lar tamasker illa napala we ta ata heka.  2 Wai limmagu  WALEKA, Noto hege nade ata walena kalawara’ma. Tanyiduwe karawa dahenage tauna. Ata behayanna bena kapore dadi ai kamang tadkana, tanyiduwe engadauge banapala kapore wal ta barana ta diha ata.  Kahada baningu kada hadikorauge tauda wal ta ata buta, oroge aida tadayi baiyai ka kalawara.  hatauwai haya  ata ai kalawara  hanaro ta kareta  tombol lif  tisu koba we pa enu  komputer/hp  pan masker  ta nauta  maus pena bina Limmada Tanyiduwe, we tarumna ata kalawara na da’we bana kadaktawe ta…  tangami engam yanakahami kapore Korona. waleka mata ata olem ta uma,  bamkoheyi matam  Nyi ai wuk kamuge bamunarodi rattu tangadi kadana, lodoge bamnaroge matam,  Wuwe lara kahadda yannana kadahilpa walta kapore Korona balidaka bahayi limmada waina habo, waleka alkohol. Kapore Korona natahna kahha diki dokabul pata jam ta pan tangngadi hadau.  Habo  Oro bataudage dau dahage dokge rade pata pahilpa dangngada.  Baha waina habo kahha nehe. Habo Hima’la Ilam jojawe matam (mono mata ata wadeka). Natujawe badagaileni “dikin lado rahidadi” haduni.  ta kabu kukku  kahha dokabullu detik  ta ka­­panga karak limma  Bahayi kabedo limma  Aga linna dawe hada baha limma kana murahai?  Bajojawe, ilam madautaka. Geha bahayi limma waina habo. Ilam jojawe pan’ge masker.  Ne we tarum  Kapore naha ana lar tamasker bana mojage bada waige.  Baitage maskerumu bana matkage. Ila waikana masker reh walta wu lado.  Waina hodeka rubba  Lakawa Ama Inya Waina kaba hahopwai dauda.  Ilam dudana haya, ilam hawukanahatauwai haya, koba we ha enu, mono kaba hahopwai.  Wale nadadimawe bammu jojawe matamu waina hima’la daumu, kaba’moge.  Bana da’kawe, bugerage mono tonwe bina waina hima’la waleka bale.  Umma Be bamhagawu aimu tamahou ta umma  Aim yahowu  Baha hakitad limmamu waina habo…  Habewai,  Habo Hamatarakige ilam kalawara!  Hamatarakige ilam kalawara!  Habo  Bacayi hatak wadeka hatulha radde dete!
